title: Marnie Simpson's boyfriend Casey Johnson shares FIRST LOOK at their 'gorgeous' baby boy
text:
Marnie Simpson's boyfriend Casey Johnson has given fans their first glimpse at their 'gorgeous' baby boy, after announcing that they had welcomed their first child.

Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, the Geordie Shore star, 24, praised his 'strong, amazing' girlfriend Marnie, 27, for giving birth to their son, after the star was induced 12 days after her due date.

It was revealed on Tuesday that Marnie and Casey had finally welcomed their first child together, but are yet to reveal their baby boy's name.

Lovely: Marnie Simpson's boyfriend Casey Johnson has given fans their first glimpse at their 'gorgeous' baby boy, after announcing that they had welcomed their first child

Sweet: aking to Instagram on Wednesday, the Geordie Shore star, 24, shared a black and white snap of his son's tiny hand clasped around his finger

Casey shared a black and white snap of his son's tiny hand clasped around his finger, along with a lengthy caption confirming the arrival of his son.

He wrote: 'Where do I start... after 28 hours of labour my strong amazing princess @marns delivered our gorgeous little man on the 29th October at 4:20pm 8.1!!! my beautiful baby boy was born, I can’t even describe my emotions right now, it’s been a long journey ( 10 months ).

'Watching the person you adore in pain is not nice but the gift we both have right now just wipes away all the bad moments through labour. I literally sit and stair at him non stop with Marnie, he’s the start of our family, he’s so cute!!!!

'Again I wanna say thank you to everybody who has messaged me it means a lot the support has been absolutely amazing.

'Marnie you have done so well you grew this human inside you and boy did you do it perfect and the right way. I love you Marnie thank you for being my baby mumma, you KILLED IT.' [sic]

Touching: In a lengthy caption Casey praised his 'strong, amazing' girlfriend Marnie for giving birth to their son, which came after she was induced 12 days past her due date

Earlier in the day it was announced that Marnie had finally welcomed her first child with Casey, revealing that she is now the proud mother of a baby boy after passing her due date by 12 days.

The star's representative told OK! magazine: 'Marnie gave birth to a beautiful baby boy yesterday afternoon. Mother and son are both doing well.'

Marnie was forced to book in for an induction after being left feeling 'horrific in so many ways' as she awaited the arrival of her baby.

The starlet has been documenting her pregnancy on social media and has been candid about the discomfort of surpassing her due date.

Proud new parents: Earlier in the day it was announced that Marnie had finally welcomed her first child with Casey

Last week, in an Instagram message shared alongside a photo of herself with Casey, she wrote: 'So blessed to have this human in my life. I've suffered so badly the last week as I'm now ten days over due and I have to admit it's tough.

'Words can't explain the discomfort, but generally wouldn't be able to get through it without you. Love you so much. I'm so lucky to have you by my side.'

Adding that she had booked her induction, she continued: 'This little guy is coming whether he likes it or not.'

Marnie was due to give birth on October 16, and said in August she couldn't wait for her son to arrive.

She shared: 'In the beginning I suffered with nausea, but since getting past 20 weeks I've been a lot better.

'Considering how bad some people's pregnancies are, I think it's been alright. I feel so swollen and bloated, I can't wait for him to arrive now.'

Support: Marnie has been documenting her pregnancy on social media and has been candid about the discomfort of surpassing her due date

Ouch: Marnie was forced to book in for an induction after being left feeling 'horrific in so many ways' as she awaited the arrival of her baby

The couple announced they were expecting their first child in April, following fears over Marnie's fertility.

Speaking to OK! magazine, the former party girl admitted that she thought motherhood was something that might never happen for her because of previous 'alcohol abuse'.

X Factor star Casey also revealed his excitement over their impending parenthood, saying: 'I don't think you're ever ready until it happens, but we're so excited. It feels amazing.'

Marnie and Casey met on celebrity dating show Single AF in late 2017 and bought a house together after just eight months of dating.

The couple experienced their fair share of ups and downs, and were hit with a series of split rumours, but by September 2018 they were back on track and vowed to start a family soon.
description: Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, the Geordie Shore star, 24, praised his 'strong, amazing' girlfriend Marnie, 27, for giving birth to their son, after the star was induced 12 days after her due date.
